Module jBomberman
Package view

Class DecoratorGravedigger

java.lang.Object
model.Gravedigger
view.DecoratorGravedigger
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecoratedGravediggerByNpc, DecoratedGravediggerScore
public abstract class DecoratorGravedigger extends Gravedigger
Gravedigger Decoration permits to add special effects to a Gravedigger related event. The state of these objects is intended to be an integer value, implemented in sub-types. DecoratorGravedigger management is entrusted to DynaSlaveGame panel in Observable-Observer way between Model and View.
